channel.title: [508-Bulby]Npcspawn writer

item.title: [508-Bulby]Npcspawn writer
item.dc:creator: @Rozak Rozak
item.description:
@Rozak wrote:

Ok guys i got bored so i started messign with a 508 bulby source. I created a command that writes the npc into npcspawn.cfg.

Here is the code:

if (cmd[0].equals("npcx")) { Engine.fileManager.appendData("npcs/npcspawn.cfg", "spawn = "+Integer.parseInt(cmd[1])+" "+p.absX+" "+p.absY+" "+p.heightLevel+"0 0 0 0 0 0 Spawn"); p.frames.sendMessage(p, "<col=0000FF>[Server]Npc spawned at "+p.absX+","+p.absY+"."); }

It is very basic as it sets the last 6 integers to 0 automatically, but it works.

Thanks, Rozak

Read full topic
